goal.ch: 本課程目的在培養台灣新一代的公司法學以及企業組織法學人材. 藉由系統性的學習, 讓學生們有效掌握各種企業組織(如獨資商號, 各種合夥及各類型公司等)的開始, 發展及解散之全部過程. 並著重在各種企業組織於21世紀現代社會產業經濟中關鍵作用的研究討論.
goal.en: The purpose of this course is to cultivate a new generation of corporate law and corporate organization law professionals in Taiwan. Through systematic study, students can effectively grasp the comprehensive process of the beginning, development and dissolution of various enterprise organizations (such as sole proprietorships, partnerships and various types of companies, etc.). And focuses on the research and discussion of the key role of various business organizations in the modern society of Taiwan in the 21st century.

outline.ch: 包括(但不限於)以下單元 1. 代理理論  2. 合夥  3. 公司基礎/架構  4. 股份有限公司的結構  5. 董事注意義務  6. 董事忠實義務  7. 股東資訊權 8. 股東代位訴訟 等等現代公司法學的重要議題.
outline.en: Including followings : Chapter 1 Agency. Chapter 2 Partnerships. Chapter 3 The foundations of a Corporation Chapter 4 The legal Structure of Publicly Held Corporations. Chapter 5 The Duty of Care. Chapter 6 The Duty of Loyalty. Chapter 7 Shareholder Informational Rights. Chapter 8 Shareholder Suits, etc.

textbook.ch: Business Organizations: Cases and Materials,James D. Cox, Melvin Aron Eisenberg, Twelfth Edition, Foundation Press, 2019.
textbook.en: Business Organizations: Cases and Materials,  James D. Cox, Melvin Aron Eisenberg,Twelfth Edition, Foundation Press, 2019.

gradMethod.ch: "對學生考核方式: 課堂討論及課堂報告70%, 期末報告30%."

ch.competencies: 獨立思考和解決問題能力
